The Las Vegas Convention Center

3150 Paradise Rd., Las Vegas, NV 89109

The Las Vegas Convention Center (LVCC), located adjacent to the Las Vegas Strip, encompasses approximately 3.2 million square feet with exhibit space of 2 million square feet and meeting space of nearly 250,000 square feet.
